Free Russian lesson any day of the week

I mean, I have played CoD, I have played Battlefield, I have played most battle royales. I have played LoL. I have played R6 Siege. I have played Rocket League. I have played a lotta games. But this is what I play. Smoothest input response of any shooter I've played. My favorite strategy game I've played. Difficult learning curve, but most rewarding. Easy to learn, impossible to master. This game has one of the first mainstream forms of crypo-currency. Made about 400 bucks off buying a 60-dollar butterfly knife in 2017, then holding it for 4 years. Community is amazing, lots of laughs. 10/10
